column1: i dye my hair a darker shade of brown
cause you like your women spanish
you said if you could have your way
youd make a nighttime all today
so itd suit the mood of your soul
life is beautiful but you dont have a clue
their magnificence it dont make sense to you
my wedding dress black leather too

to seem like cherries in the spring
but oh what can i do
to turn you on or get through you
life is beautiful but you dont have a clue
their magnificence it dont make sense to you
